Package dev.blu.model.core

Class FileCipher

java.lang.Object
dev.blu.model.core.FileCipher
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileDecryptor, FileEncryptor
public abstract class FileCipher
extends java.lang.Object
Class that contains file encryption/decryption methods
Author:
blubo

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.io.File Decrypt​(char[] password)
    Decryption method, takes a password to perform a symmetric decryption with an AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding Cipher instance
    java.io.File Encrypt​(char[] password)
    Encryption method, takes a password to perform a symmetric encryption with an AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding Cipher instance

    Gets the buffer length

    • Encrypt

      public java.io.File Encrypt​(char[] password) throws java.io.IOException, java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException, java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException, javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException, java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException, java.security.InvalidKeyException, javax.crypto.BadPaddingException, javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
      Encryption method, takes a password to perform a symmetric encryption with an AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding Cipher instance
      Parameters:
      password - The password used to encrypt the File
      Returns:
      The encrypted File
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - IOException
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - No such algorithm
      java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException - Invalid Key Spec
      javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException - No such padding
      java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - Invalid Algorithm Parameter
      java.security.InvalidKeyException - invalid key
      javax.crypto.BadPaddingException - Bad padding
      javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException - illegal block size

    • Decrypt

      public java.io.File Decrypt​(char[] password) throws java.io.IOException, java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException, java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException, javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException, java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException, java.security.InvalidKeyException, javax.crypto.BadPaddingException, javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
      Decryption method, takes a password to perform a symmetric decryption with an AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding Cipher instance
      Parameters:
      password - The password used to decrypt the File
      Returns:
      The decrypted File
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - IOException
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - No such algorithm
      java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException - Invalid Key Spec
      javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException - No such padding
      java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - Invalid Algorithm Parameter
      java.security.InvalidKeyException - invalid key
      javax.crypto.BadPaddingException - Bad padding
      javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException - illegal block size
